alert.note: Alert for Barbour (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 3:26PM EDT until May 08 at 4:34AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in West Virginia... Tygart Valley River At Philippi affecting Barbour County. For the Tygart Valley River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tygart Valley River At Philippi. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, The intersection of US Route 119 and Truck Route 250 is flooded. Also, Sycamore Street and Beech Avenue are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM EDT Saturday was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.0 feet on 03/20/2002. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EDT.
